name: nexus
description: Nexus is a software repository manager. It supports Bower, Docker, Maven 2, npm, NuGet, PyPI, and Raw site repositories. Installation documentation can be found at https://github.com/dcos/examples/tree/master/1.8/nexus
preInstallNotes: This DC/OS Service is currently EXPERIMENTAL. There may be bugs, incomplete features, incorrect documentation, or other discrepancies. Having Marathon-lb installed and setting a virtual host in the config is required for being able to access Nexus. If you're using a host volume, make sure that the folder exists on the host you used for host pinning, and that you did a 'chown -R 200:200' on the folder. Default credentials are admin/admin123. Please change them after the first login.
postInstallNotes: Nexus has been installed. Documentation can be found at http://books.sonatype.com/nexus-book/
postUninstallNotes: Nexus has been uninstalled. Note that any data persisted to a host volume still exists and will need to be manually removed.
